tool_description: Mask Your Resume API helps in removing unconscious bias from the recruitment process by allowing recruiters to select candidates based on skills and experience.
name: Mask Your Resume
title: Mask Your Resume

api_list.name: Mask Your Resume
api_list.description: The endpoint keeps the resume in the original format while masking the biased data fields with 'X'.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mask-your-resume.p.rapidapi.com/redactResume"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mask-your-resume.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mask-your-resume.p.rapidapi.com/redactResume"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mask-your-resume.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
